SEARCH
Package application.customerui

Class PaymentPage

java.lang.Object
application.customerui.PaymentPage
class PaymentPage extends Object
  • Class serves as a UI Page for Customer to decide to how they wish to dine and their payment preference
  • This UI comes subsequently after customer has checkout on the "OderingPage" UI
    • Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    FDAB 2

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors
      Constructor
      Description
      PaymentPage(Scanner sc, Cart cart)
      Constructor for PaymentPage class, creating the object will generate a UI page for customer \ This UI page will request for dining and payment preference from the customer and call the respective functions for the customer class

      The Method generates a random number that represents customers unique orderID Generation is done by generating random numbers and appending a random letter

    • Constructor Details

      • PaymentPage

        PaymentPage(Scanner sc, Cart cart)
      • Constructor for PaymentPage class, creating the object will generate a UI page for customer \
      • This UI page will request for dining and payment preference from the customer and call the respective functions for the customer class
        • Parameters:
        sc - scanner object
        cart - Cart containing all food orders from customer

    • Method Details

      • isSuccessPayment

        public boolean isSuccessPayment()
        Method determines if the payment is successful or not
        Returns:
        successPayment attribute denoting success of the payment

      • getOrder

        public Order getOrder()
        Getter function for retrieving the order of the current customer
        Returns:
        Order object containing all food items customer has ordered

      • generateOrderId

        public String generateOrderId(int orderIdLength)
      • The Method generates a random number that represents customers unique orderID
      • Generation is done by generating random numbers and appending a random letter
        • Parameters:
        orderIdLength - Length of the orderID to be generated
        Returns:
        A randomly generated orderID for customers to track their order
